metadata.title: CVE-2021-47442 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFC:digital: fix possible memory leak in digital_in_send_sdd_req() 'skb' isallocated in digital_in_send_sdd_req(), but not free whendigital_in_send_cmd() failed, which will cause memory leak. Fix it byfreeing 'skb' if digital_in_send_cmd() return failed.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
